title:
Joint Modeling of Search and Recommendations Via an Unified Contextual
  Recommender (UniCoRn)
authors: Moumita Bhattacharya and Vito Ostuni and Sudarshan Lamkhede
abstract:
Search and recommendation systems are essential in many services, and they
are often developed separately, leading to complex maintenance and technical
debt. In this paper, we present a unified deep learning model that efficiently
handles key aspects of both tasks.
